thread.title: Dianne De Mink
thread.title_full: Thrift Books reviewed by Dianne De Mink

author: Dianne De Mink
title: Dianne De Mink
text: Love this site -even the books rated 'good' have so little 'damage' it goes unnoticed. It also has helped me find old favorites (worn out & in tatters on my shelf), try new- to- me authors, as well as sending a bunch of books to faraway friends (in the US) for special celebrations. Good books, fast service. AHHH heaven should be so good!
